segments.text: Are you ready for the camping trip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All set . I've got my makeup , my Cds , and my portable TV set ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hello ! We're supposed to be getting back to nature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , yeah . Anyway ... I'm packed . Are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been packed for a week . All my stuff is in this backpack .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see ... two books ... birdseed ?
segments.speaker: S2
